verbose_text: In contrast to the observation that Obatoclax did not induce any appreciable changes in ATP production in anaplastic thyroid cancer cells XREF_BIBR, Fig. XREF_FIG C showed that although 2 muM Obatoclax did not affect the basal respiratory rate, it augmented proton leak and reduced ATP production significantly after treatment for 36 h.
evidence: Obatoclax did not induce any appreciable changes in ATP
